articles.title: Neural and computational underpinnings of biased confidence in human reinforcement learning - Nature.com
articles.description: The mechanism of confidence formation in learning remains poorly understood. Here, the authors show that both dorsal and ventral prefrontal networks encode confidence, but only the ventral network incorporates the valence-induced bias.
